note: MATH dataset requires authentication or direct download from https://github.com/hendrycks/math
dataset: MATH (Measuring Massive Multitask Language Understanding - Mathematics)
download_instructions: Visit https://github.com/hendrycks/math and follow the download instructions, or use: pip install datasets && python -c "from datasets import load_dataset; ds = load_dataset('lighteval/MATH', 'all')"
